name: blackdust.vim
summary: darkish colour scheme, inverse of whitedust
description:
I inverted whitedust.vim (vimscript #348) by hand, then decided that was a complete waste of time, and wrote vimscript #405 to do automatic inversions for me :)
In any case, here is blackdust, the inverse of whitedust.
install_details: drop it into your ~/.vim/colors/ directory, complain to Bram that he can't spell "colour" in english ;)
